function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low UGS density per person","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding in public spaces","Mitigation":"Increase the UGS density or create alternative public spaces","Technologies":"Smart city planning, urban design, green infrastructure","People":"Residents, visitors, and city dwellers","Owner":"City planning authorities, urban developers, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing in UGS","Impact":"Potential for disease transmission in crowded UGS","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, limit UGS capacity, increase UGS accessibility","Technologies":"Monitoring technology, public safety infrastructure, crowd management systems","People":"Residents, visitors, and city dwellers","Owner":"City authorities, park management, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Heterogeneous UGS distribution and accessibility","Impact":"Unequal access to green spaces, leading to potential disparities in health and well-being","Mitigation":"Equitably distribute UGS, improve connectivity, and provide amenities in underserved areas","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, mobile applications for UGS navigation, community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of overlapping influence areas, urban dwellers","Owner":"City planning authorities, community organizations, and advocacy groups"}]}
